content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/simulator-google-sheets is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

1. First, I'll view the directory structure
2. Look at the pom.xml or build.gradle to understand the project setup
3. Identify Java 8 specific code that needs to be updated
4. Update build configuration to use Java 17
5. Fix any compatibility issues
6. Run mvn clean verify to ensure everything works

Let me start by exploring the repository.

content.text: I'll help you migrate this Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure and understanding the current setup.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--
  ~ Copyright (C) 2018 Red Hat, Inc.
  ~
  ~ Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
  ~ you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
  ~ You may obtain a copy of the License at

  ~ distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
  ~ WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
  ~ See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
  ~ limitations under the License.
  -->
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

  <groupId>io.syndesis.simulator</groupId>
  <artifactId>simulator-google-sheets</artifactId>
  <version>0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <name>Google Sheets Simulator</name>
  <packaging>jar</packaging>

  <properties>
    <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
    <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
    <skipIntegrationTests>true</skipIntegrationTests>

    <citrus.simulator.version>1.0.3</citrus.simulator.version>
    <citrus.version>2.7.3</citrus.version>
    <spring.boot.version>1.5.18.RELEASE</spring.boot.version>
    <junit.version>4.12</junit.version>

    <docker.maven.plugin.version>0.28.0</docker.maven.plugin.version>
    <fabric8.maven.plugin.version>3.5.41</fabric8.maven.plugin.version>

    <openshift.namespace>syndesis</openshift.namespace>
    <application.name>${project.artifactId}</application.name>
    <image.name>syndesis/${project.artifactId}</image.name>
  </properties>

  <dependencyManagement>
    <dependencies>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
        <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
        <type>pom</type>
        <scope>import</scope>
      </dependency>
    </dependencies>
  </dependencyManagement>

  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.security.oauth</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-security-oauth2</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId>
      <optional>true</optional>
    </dependency>

    <!-- Citrus Simulator -->
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.consol.citrus</groupId>
      <artifactId>citrus-simulator-starter</artifactId>
      <version>${citrus.simulator.version}</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.consol.citrus</groupId>
      <artifactId>citrus-simulator-ui</artifactId>
      <version>${citrus.simulator.version}</version>
    </dependency>

    <!-- Google sheets API -->
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.apis</groupId>
      <artifactId>google-api-services-sheets</artifactId>
      <version>v4-rev551-1.22.0</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.api-client</groupId>
      <artifactId>google-api-client</artifactId>
      <version>1.22.0</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.oauth-client</groupId>
      <artifactId>google-oauth-client</artifactId>
      <version>1.22.0</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.http-client</groupId>
      <artifactId>google-http-client-jackson2</artifactId>
      <version>1.22.0</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.http-client</groupId>
      <artifactId>google-http-client</artifactId>
      <version>1.22.0</version>
    </dependency>

    <!-- Test scoped dependencies -->
    <dependency>
      <groupId>junit</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
      <version>${junit.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>

  <build>
    <resources>
      <resource>
        <directory>src/main/fabric8</directory>
        <targetPath>META-INF/fabric8</targetPath>
        <filtering>true</filtering>
      </resource>
      <resource>
        <directory>src/main/resources</directory>
        <filtering>true</filtering>
        <excludes>
          <exclude>**/*.p12</exclude>
          <exclude>**/*.jks</exclude>
          <exclude>**/*.crt</exclude>
        </excludes>
      </resource>
      <resource>
        <directory>src/main/resources</directory>
        <filtering>false</filtering>
        <includes>
          <include>**/*.p12</include>
          <include>**/*.jks</include>
          <include>**/*.crt</include>
        </includes>
      </resource>
    </resources>

    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.7.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <encoding>${project.build.sourceEncoding}</encoding>
          <source>1.8</source>
          <target>1.8</target>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.1.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <archive>
            <addMavenDescriptor>true</addMavenDescriptor>
          </archive>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>2.22.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <failIfNoTests>false</failIfNoTests>
          <workingDirectory>${project.build.directory}</workingDirectory>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-failsafe-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>2.22.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <skip>${skipIntegrationTests}</skip>
          <additionalClasspathElements>
            <additionalClasspathElement>${project.build.outputDirectory}</additionalClasspathElement>
          </additionalClasspathElements>
          <failIfNoTests>false</failIfNoTests>
        </configuration>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>integration-tests</id>
            <goals>
              <goal>integration-test</goal>
              <goal>verify</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <goals>
              <goal>repackage</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>io.fabric8</groupId>
        <artifactId>docker-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${docker.maven.plugin.version}</version>
        <configuration>
          <verbose>true</verbose>
          <images>
            <image>
              <alias>${application.name}</alias>
              <name>${image.name}:latest</name>
              <build>
                <dockerFileDir>${project.basedir}/src/main/docker</dockerFileDir>
                <assembly>
                  <descriptorRef>artifact</descriptorRef>
                </assembly>
                <args>
                  <APP_JAR>${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.jar</APP_JAR>
                </args>
              </build>
              <run>
                <namingStrategy>alias</namingStrategy>
                <ports>
                  <port>8443:8443</port>
                </ports>
                <wait>
                  <log>Started GoogleSheetsSimulator</log>
                  <time>60000</time>
                  <shutdown>500</shutdown>
                </wait>
                <log>
                  <enabled>true</enabled>
                  <color>green</color>
                </log>
              </run>
            </image>
          </images>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>io.fabric8</groupId>
        <artifactId>fabric8-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${fabric8.maven.plugin.version}</version>
        <configuration>
          <mode>openshift</mode>
          <verbose>true</verbose>
          <images>
            <image>
              <alias>${project.artifactId}</alias>
              <name>${image.name}:latest</name>
            </image>
          </images>
          <resources>
            <labels>
              <all>
                <property>
                  <name>app</name>
                  <value>${project.artifactId}</value>
                </property>
              </all>
            </labels>
          </resources>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>

  <profiles>
    <profile>
      <id>integration</id>
      <properties>
        <skipIntegrationTests>false</skipIntegrationTests>
      </properties>
    </profile>

    <profile>
      <id>embedded</id>
      <properties>
        <skipIntegrationTests>false</skipIntegrationTests>
      </properties>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <id>embedded-start</id>
                <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>start</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <fork>true</fork>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>embedded-stop</id>
                <phase>post-integration-test</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>stop</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>

    <profile>
      <id>docker</id>
      <properties>
        <skipIntegrationTests>false</skipIntegrationTests>
      </properties>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>io.fabric8</groupId>
            <artifactId>docker-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>${docker.maven.plugin.version}</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <id>docker-build</id>
                <phase>package</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>build</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>container-start</id>
                <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>start</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
              <execution>
                <id>container-stop</id>
                <phase>post-integration-test</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>stop</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>

    <profile>
      <id>fabric8</id>
      <properties>
        <fabric8.generator.name>${image.name}:%l</fabric8.generator.name>
      </properties>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.codehaus.gmavenplus</groupId>
            <artifactId>gmavenplus-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>1.6</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <id>get-openshift-properties</id>
                <phase>initialize</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>execute</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
            <configuration>
              <scripts>
                <script>${basedir}/src/main/script/openshift.properties.groovy</script>
              </scripts>
            </configuration>
            <dependencies>
              <dependency>
                <groupId>org.codehaus.groovy</groupId>
                <artifactId>groovy-all</artifactId>
                <version>2.4.12</version>
                <scope>runtime</scope>
              </dependency>
            </dependencies>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
  </profiles>

</project>

Now let me start the migration process. The main steps are:

1. Update the pom.xml to use Java 17
2. Update Spring Boot and other dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
3. Check for any deprecated APIs or Java 8 specific code

There's a missing version for the spring-security-oauth2 dependency. Let me check the dependencies section and fix this issue. Also, Spring Boot 2.x has significant changes in OAuth support:

File content displayed in console.
Content:         <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
        <type>pom</type>
        <scope>import</scope>
      </dependency>
    </dependencies>
  </dependencyManagement>

  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.security.oauth</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-security-oauth2</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-configuration-processor</artifactId>
      <optional>true</optional>

content.text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Migration completed successfully! ✅

### Changes Made

#### 1. Updated Maven Properties (pom.xml)
- Added `maven.compiler.source=17`
- Added `maven.compiler.target=17`
- Added `maven.compiler.release=17`
- Updated Spring Boot: 1.5.18.RELEASE → 2.7.18
- Updated JUnit: 4.12 → 4.13.2
- Updated docker-maven-plugin: 0.28.0 → 0.43.4
- Updated fabric8-maven-plugin: 3.5.41 → 4.4.2

#### 2. Updated Maven Compiler Plugin
- Version: 3.7.0 → 3.11.0
- Configuration: Changed from source/target 1.8 to release 17

#### 3. Updated Maven Test Plugins
- maven-surefire-plugin: 2.22.0 → 2.22.2
- maven-failsafe-plugin: 2.22.0 → 2.22.2

#### 4. Fixed Dependencies
- Added explicit version for spring-security-oauth2: 2.5.2.RELEASE

### Verification
- ✅ Compilation successful with Java 17
- ✅ All 8 unit tests pass
- ✅ `mvn clean verify` completes successfully
- ✅ Generated class files use Java 17 bytecode (major version: 61)

### Build Results
```
Tests run: 8, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
BUILD SUCCESS
```

The project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17 and is fully compatible.

Perfect! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been completed successfully. The build passes with `mvn clean verify`, all tests pass, and the compiled bytecode is now at Java 17 level (major version 61).

## Summary of Changes:

1. **Updated Java version** from 1.8 to 17 in Maven properties and compiler plugin
2. **Upgraded Spring Boot** from 1.5.18.RELEASE to 2.7.18 (compatible with Java 17)
3. **Updated Maven plugins** to versions compatible with Java 17
4. **Fixed dependency issues** by adding explicit version for spring-security-oauth2
5. **All tests pass successfully** - 8 unit tests with 0 failures

The project is now fully migrated to Java 17 and ready to use! 🎉
